text: - Hi, my name is Sandeep.
I work with Global Accelerator,

which is part of the AWS edge
services family of services.
My favorite thing about working

with the Global Accelerator
team and the product team there,
is the amount of ownership we have.

We get to talk with our
stakeholders, our customers a lot.
Talk to them about the requirements,
what are their pain points,

what are they looking to do
with AWS and edge services
and really deliver it to them.
'Cause we're a relatively new service,
we can experiment, move fast.

And to see all of that
go into our customers
and see that translate for their end users
is an amazing experience.

I was actually an intern with
the Global Accelerator team

back in 2020, and
obviously love the people,

love the culture, love
the work we are doing

and looking forward to
the growth of our service
in the upcoming years.
To anyone who wants to intern or work

as part of Global
Accelerator or edge services

or AWS in general, the
amount of the breadth
and the spectrum of things that
that you could be working on.
You could enjoy doing marketing

or pricing or go-to-market
strategies or sales.

So there's this wide and
huge breadth of things
that we could be doing as initiatives.
So it's really up to you,

and you can really discover
what interests you.

What I tell anyone is
the amount of ownership

and responsibility that
that you'll would get,

you have complete control
over your projects
and everyone's willing to hear our ideas,

hear opinions, bring
big ideas to the table

and then keep learning
and pushing forward.
(upbeat music)
